text: Hitobito yo, shito wa tashikani-nushi kara no shinri o motte anata gata no moto ni kita. Dakara anata gata wa shinji nasai. Sore ga anata gata no tame ni mottomo yoi. Tatoe anata gata ga shinjinakute mo, hontōni ten to ji no subete no mono wa, arrā no yūdearu. Arrā wa zenchi ni shite eimei de ara reru
